snippet: " We go to Wellwood about the end of this month," replied Matilda; "but we have a great many visits to pay at different places, in the course of the summer and autumn."

title: St. Andrews and elsewhere;

snippet: And I do not think that when Alexander was gone, Wellwood desired that long lease any more.

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: " Wretched man!" said the abbot, unable to sup-press his rising indignation, " is it to the Abbot ofSaint Mary's that you boast having misled the soulof a dweller in Our Lady's halidome into the pathsof soul error and damning heresy?—Thou doesturge me, Wellwood, beyond what it becomes me tobear, and movest me to employ the few moments ofpower I may yet possess, in removing from the faceof the earth one, whose qualities, given by God,have beeu so utterly perverted as thine to the service of Satan."
